descriptions:
['DescriptionLuxuryProperty.com is delighted to present one of Dubai’s finest homes in the sector R of the Emirates Hills.
- Plot 19,000 Sq.Ft.
- Interior Design by Perla Lichi
- Exterior Design by Terrafirma
- All En-Suite Bedrooms
- Private Cinema
- Large Pool
- Covered Poolside Kitchen with Full Barbecue Setup
- Huge Rooftop Terrace with Pergola and Water Feature 
Located in the quiet Sector R, it features an imposing three-tiered stone façade fronted by a landscaped courtyard and shaded seating area. The interiors are breathtaking, with elegantly laid out reception room connecting to a formal dining room overlooking the backyard. The ground level also features a family room, a kitchen with Viking appliances.
An ornate glass balustrades staircase leads to the first floor where each bedroom is en-suite with access to its own balcony. The master suite offers polished wooden floors, a walk-in dressing room and an elevated Jacuzzi topped by a chandelier.
The detailing in this villa is exceptional, wood and marble finishes are used through in varying tones of brown, beige and cream. You will also find a private cinema and a beautiful wood-finished home office. 
The backyard is centred on a large pool flanked by palm trees and has lighting features, at a glance looks like the pool area of an island resort 
This would be an excellent primary residence for our most discerning clients.']

http://think-properties.ae/dubai-hills-emaar/club-villas/
Call Sonu b miglanni +971555519767
Property Details: 
* Selling Price :  2,850,000
* Size starts at: 2,927 sqft , plot 3054 sqft
   orignal price : 3,277,888
* Equipped with all modern amenities, gorgeous kitchen fittings, stunning bathroom fixtures & efficient lighting
* Spectacular views and open spaces
* Community Lifestyle for families to flourish
* Lush fairways nestled between green expanses
* Residents will also have access to the clubhouse, golf course, and various retail and dining choices
Ideally located by the 18-hole championship golf course, Club Villas at Dubai Hills is set to become one of the most exclusive communities in the city. Lush green landscapes complemented by opulent facilities such as the clubhouse and course, as well as retail and dining choices, will set the standard for a luxurious community lifestyle.
Visit our website www.think-properties.ae to find the best deals in the market.']

Sunrise Bay at Emaar Beachfront is a premium twin tower of   26 storeys set only a few steps away from the glimmering bay and the vibrant marina. Comprising one, two, three and four-bedroom apartments, each promising breath-taking sunrise views.
